replies.bodyText:
When actor.close() is called then every scheduled job is canceled. That mean, if closePartition() is called first and actor.close() is called later then this interrupts the closeFuture.onComplete() chain in stepByStepClosing(). So, we need to continue with the closing of the partition.
What exactly do you suggest?

timeline.message:
chore(broker): avoid concurrency in closing the partition

* using actor.close() to interrupt all running jobs (i.e. installing or closing the partition or a part of it)
* closing the partition in action.onClosing() that blocks the close future until its done

chore(broker): avoid concurrency in closing the partition
